downloadTitle: Office 2003 Document: Office 2003 Service Pack 3 White Paper
downloadDescription: This white paper discusses the benefits of deploying Microsoft Office 2003 Service Pack 3 (SP3) before upgrading to the 2007 Microsoft Office system, and details improvements to security and user experience.
detailsSection: This white paper discusses the benefits of deploying Office 2003 SP3 before upgrading to the 2007 Office system, and details improvements to security and user experience. Office 2003 SP3 is the culmination of several years of improvements to the product suite. Office 2003 SP3 improves performance and simplifies use of key Microsoft Office programs while providing tighter coupling to the new Microsoft Windows Vista operating system and 2007 Microsoft Office system. Also included with Office 2003 SP3 is a crucial update that addresses security issues for legacy file formats and new tools to protect the company’s IT and intellectual assets.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download applies to the following Microsoft Office program:
    • Microsoft Office 2003
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

  1. Download the file by clicking the Download link (above).
  2. Select the file and then save it to your hard disk.
Instructions for use:

Open this document in Microsoft Word to read or print it.

To remove this download:

Delete the document from your computer.
